definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)

sentences.english: He said the excuse given was that there was no warrant.
sentences.chinese: 他说给出的解释是没有正当理由。

sentences.english: However, no co-owner shall refuse consent without proper justification.
sentences.chinese: 但各共有人无正当理由，不得拒绝同意。

sentences.english: I'll come right out and say it. This is the only legitimate excuse I can think of.
sentences.chinese: 恕我直言，这是我认为唯一的正当理由。

sentences.english: Consider misgovernment to be a justification for revolution.
sentences.chinese: 把对国家治理不当看作是革命的正当理由。

sentences.english: However, the stock exchange, with legitimate reasons, may apply to the Commission for an extension.
sentences.chinese: 但有正当理由者，事前得向本会申请核准延展之。

sentences.english: If he does not accept the penalty within the time limit without any justifiable reason, his motor vehicle driving license shall be revoked.
sentences.chinese: 无正当理由逾期未接受处理的，吊销机动车驾驶证。

sentences.english: You have no right to seek into my life without just cause.
sentences.chinese: 没有正当理由你无权过问我的生活。

sentences.english: You cannot break the contract without any good reason.
sentences.chinese: 假如没有什么正当理由，你们不应撕毁合同。

sentences.english: Article 18. The entity under sampling may not reject sample drawing if it has no justifiable reason.
sentences.chinese: 被抽样单位无正当理由不得拒绝抽样。

sentences.english: WHO has historically collaborated with the pharmaceutical industry for legitimate reasons.
sentences.chinese: 世卫组织出于正当理由一向与制药业合作。

sentences.english: Both seemed to have been ill-founded worries.
sentences.chinese: 上面的两个担心看来是没有正当理由的担心。

sentences.english: Animals, in general, now fear humans, and with legitimate reasons.
sentences.chinese: 总体来说，动物现在害怕人类，且有正当理由。

sentences.english: Being absent from duty for three (3) or more consecutive days or six (6) days in a month without justification.
sentences.chinese: 无正当理由连续旷职三日以上或一个月内达六天者。

sentences.english: You should ask yourself, “IfI have to, can I fully justify this dismissal?
sentences.chinese: 你应当自问，“我有开除他的正当理由吗？”

sentences.english: Good cause shall constitute any breach of the terms of this Authorization.
sentences.chinese: 正当理由包括对本授权书的任何条款有违约行为。

sentences.english: Being absent from duty for 3 or more consecutive days or 6 days per a month without justification.
sentences.chinese: 无正当理由连续旷职三日以上或一个月内达六天者。

definition: to have the right to/to be entitled to/to have authority/powerful
to counter accusations/to protest/to remonstrate/to retort/to plead/to demur/a plea (of not guilty)/a defense (against an allegation)/to enter a plea to a charge (in a law court)
to use as an excuse/on the pretext/excuse/pretext
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
